title.narrative: DISASTER RISK REDUCTION IN EDUCATION

description.narrative: By 2018, schools and communities of the most vulnerable areas to disasters strengthened their resilience capacities., which contributes to Disaster Risk Reduction, Education In Emergencies, Education â€“ General, Environmental Sustainability, Equitable Access To Quality Education. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Global Thematic Humanitarian Funds received from LACRO to support

description.narrative: UNICEF Cuba supports the spread of best practices in disaster risk reduction from the school and identifies the needs to increase risk perception in communities exposed to multiple risks. | Status:Met | As-of Date:31/01/2020
